dynamic-hibernate-statement.sql-query: SELECT a.* FROM app_cibn_series a left join app_media_series b on a.id=b.id WHERE b.id is null <#if startYear??> and a.releaseYear >= :startYear </#if> <#if endYear??> and a.releaseYear <=:endYear </#if> <#if categoryId??> and a.categoryId in (:categoryId) </#if>
